text.style: font-family:Calibri; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: A lot of progress has been made on supporting the VO/Vulcan language.

text.style: font-family:Calibri; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: There are only a hand full of relatively small things missing:

text.style: font-family:Calibri; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: Init procedures are not supported yet. Init procedures in the SDK classes however are called correctly.

text.style: font-family:Calibri; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: User defined commands in the preprocessor are not supported yet

text.style: font-family:Calibri; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: Some VO compatibility compiler options are not working:

text.style: font-family:Calibri; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: Some operations with USUALs require manual casting

text.style: font-family:Calibri; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: The Visual Studio integration supports the Edit/Compile/Debug cycle. The Form editor and WPF editor are also working now.

text.style: font-family:Calibri; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Missing features in the Visual Studio Integration:

text.style: font-family:Calibri; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: Most of the intellisense (member lists, parameter tips, Goto definition, code collapsing, code snippets etc.)

text.style: font-family:Calibri; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: The VO Binary editors are missing

link.style: font-family:Calibri; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
